channel.title: Frank & Pat
channel.description:
We are Donna and Jenny, and we've got a weekly show on the brilliant Brixton Radio.
frankandpatchat@gmail.com for any emails.
channel.itunes:author: Frank & Pat
channel.itunes:summary:
We are Donna and Jenny, and we've got a weekly show on the brilliant Brixton Radio.
frankandpatchat@gmail.com for any emails.

item.title: Frank & Pat Chat – Episode 15 – The Reunion
item.description:
Jenny's back! And with her she's bought some brand new jingles, and a brand new state of mind. She's finally found herself.
We're not skirting around the big issues in this show, Which? magazine, adults riding scooters, and hobbies designed for people with too much time on their hands. We don't give a ship, our chat gets seriously real in this reunion special.
item.itunes:author: Frank & Pat
item.itunes:summary:
Jenny's back! And with her she's bought some brand new jingles, and a brand new state of mind. She's finally found herself.
We're not skirting around the big issues in this show, Which? magazine, adults riding scooters, and hobbies designed for people with too much time on their hands. We don't give a ship, our chat gets seriously real in this reunion special.

item.title: Frank & Pat Chat – Episode 14 – Holiday Special
item.description:
It's the Frank & Pat Holiday Special! Donna's already been, and Jenny has only just up and left. We've devised what we think is a pretty good soundtrack to the upcoming warmer months.
Here's the playlist if your head can't handle much more chat, and just to warn you – this is the last Frank and Pat for a few weeks, because we are literally on holiday. This is not a drill.
http://open.spotify.com/user/dasmartster/playlist/14XcnYt2HrUBePVY3gu7Xj
If you like what you hear, we'd love you to share – and you can tweet us using the longest handle we could think of @frank_and_pat. We're on Facebook too!
https://www.facebook.com/FrankandPat

item.title: Frank & Pat Chat – Episode 13 – Royal Baby Special
item.description:
It's here! Well the baby isn't, but the podcast is – you can't make it up!
The Royal bets are on, and we think we've cracked what it's going to be called. We're preparing our smug faces for the official announcement. We also talk about how annoying Jeremy Clarkson is – this is nothing to do with the Royal youngster, and don't let it put you off.
Here's the Spotify link for when you host your Royal baby party.
https://play.spotify.com/user/dasmartster/playlist/6PnRCelXIq764attG3zB3G

item.title: Frank & Pat Chat – Episode 12 – You're an April Fool
item.description:
It's the Frank and Pat April Fools Special!
We chat pranks and general hilaria. Will Donna be and April Fool, or an April Cool? Will anyone crack Jenny's cryptic band facts?
There's a smashing playlist too – here it is without the talking if you're at a party or something.
https://play.spotify.com/user/dasmartster/playlist/0KHyikOdZtbj14GBGHUF4H

item.title: Frank & Pat Chat - Episode 11 - Manatee Appreciation Special
item.description:
Did you know there is a day in the year where you can appreciate all things Manatee related? No? Well you do now!
In honour of Manatee Appreciation Day (March 25th 2015) we are bringing you a show full of Manatee facts & trivia, play Manatee or Mananot, continue our mission to fall in love with each other, generally chat gibberish, and all whilst bringing you the best in Manatee based music.
And remember, if you enjoyed the Manatee themed fun this week, don’t forget to like and share the show so that we can get to the top of the comedy charts.
Here's a link to the Spotify playlist . . . https://open.spotify.com/user/dasmartster/playlist/7vFsQiuEXUuiubZ0ZpQ1x0

item.title: Frank & Pat Chat - Episode 10 - St Patrick's Day
item.description:
Why can't you borrow money from a leprechaun? Because just like one half of Frank & Pat, they're always a little short. LOLZ
This week we are celebrating St Patrick's Day and all things Irish. We bring you some jaw dropping Pierce Brosnan facts, discuss our top five Irish exports, continue our mission to fall in love with each other and generally chat nonsense. And all whilst bringing you the best in vaguely Irish themed music.
And remember, if you enjoyed the Irish themed hilarity this week, don’t forget to like and share the show so that we can get to the top of the comedy charts.
Here's a link to the Spotify playlist . . . https://play.spotify.com/user/dasmartster/playlist/6mMfXYmnKzS8KAuoq4pxfv

item.title: Frank & Pat Chat - Episode 9 - “Mother's Day”
item.description:
Do you have a Mum? Are you a Mum? Do you like Mums? Do you really dislike Mums? Or maybe you are indifferent to Mums? If any of these statements apply to you, then you'll love this episode of Frank & Pat.
In this show we are still trying to fall in love with each other, discuss what we'd be like as pushy parents, investigate if Little Richard really was little, and pick our ideal celebrity Mum. And all whilst playing you a selection of wonderful music.
And remember folks, if you enjoyed the Mum fun this week, don’t forget to like and share the show so that we can get to the top of the comedy charts.
Here's a link to the Spotify playlist . . . https://open.spotify.com/user/dasmartster/playlist/3Gy5S3W2A4clc6unSvQ4bX

item.title: Frank & Pat Chat - Episode 8 - “Pork”
item.description:
If this show had an ingredients label it would read as follows: 50% pork based frivolities, 50% wonderful pork based music
That's right, it's finally Pork week on the Frank & Pat Show, and there really isn't much more to say than that. There's just going to be lots of pork based chat including a top 5 Pork based snack list. Go on, have a little nibble . . .
And remember folks, if you enjoyed the pork filled fun this week, don’t forget to like and share the show so that we can get to the top of the comedy charts.
Here's a link to the Spotify playlist . . . http://open.spotify.com/user/dasmartster/playlist/5c2URc3uMqf6YgpA9AppSf

item.title: Frank & Pat Chat - Episode 7 - “The Oscars 2015”
item.description:
And the award for best radio show goes to . . . THE FRANK & PAT OSCARS 2015 SPECIAL!
It’s award season and what better way to celebrate than with Jennifer Lawrence’s favourite canapé, prawn cocktail with Scotch Egg halves. We chat to our man on the ground in LA, Adam Bright, who sort of brings us up to speed on the latest Oscar gossip, practise our Oscar award acceptance speeches, and obsess over the highest grossing movie flop that is Fifty Shades of Grey. All accompanied by a finely curated playlist of the very best in movie inspired tunes
And remember folks, if you were enjoyed our Oscar 2015 special this week, don’t forget to like and share the show so that we can get to the top of the comedy charts.
Here's a link to the Spotify playlist . . . http://open.spotify.com/user/dasmartster/playlist/0d5JYleDW5JRkFwal40R6J

item.title: Frank & Pat Chat - Episode 6 "Valentine's Day"
item.description:
Why do oysters love to dance? Because it makes them Aphro”dizzy”ac. You’re welcome.
This week we are all about Valentine’s Day. We taste some of the world’s top aphrodisiacs, continue to road test 36 Questions which are guaranteed to make someone fall in love with you, chat romantic novels & our favorite love stories, reminisce about Lorenzo’s Oil, and as always, all whilst bringing you the finest in erotic (sort of, well, not really) music.
HUBBA HUBBA.
And remember folks, if you were aroused and/or amused by our Valentine’s special this week, don’t forget to like and share the show so that we can get to the top of the comedy charts.
Here's a link to the Spotify playlist . . . http://open.spotify.com/user/dasmartster/playlist/1GFyDE1PR1Vjm5CT7WRkiO

item.title: Frank & Pat Chat - Episode 5 "Forever Celebrating"
item.description:
This week we are forever celebrating, starting with a 90% chicken based dinner supplied by a well known fast food chain (rhyming with pac bonalds), accompanied by a delicious bottle of budget Prosecco (from a shop rhyming with Fiddle) . . .
We road test 36 Questions which are guaranteed to make someone fall in love with you, chat about Gwyneth Paltrow (G –Pal) and her new vaginal steaming obsession*, make an abysmal attempt to get a Frank & Pat catchphrase started, and all whilst playing you a super selection of music.
PAAARTAAAAAY.
And remember folks, if you enjoyed forever celebrating with us this week, don’t forget to like and share the show so that we can get to the top of the comedy charts.
Here's a link to the Spotify playlist . . .
http://open.spotify.com/user/dasmartster/playlist/2SX5kBH1KvZoi1HywxMsOo
*Yes, you read correctly, vaginal steaming. Don’t make us type "vaginal steaming" again. Actually, we are quite enjoying writing “vaginal steaming"

item.title: Franks & Pat Chat - Episode 4 "The Futility of Life"
item.description:
This week the theme, as suggested by a beloved listener, is the futility of life . . .
To honor this theme, we play a selection of music which takes you through the lows & then highs of life, chat recipe changes of one of Britain’s best loved Easter confectionaries, reveal more awesome made up jokes and generally chat more silly business.
IN YOUR FACE FUTILITY OF LIFE.
And remember folks, if you enjoyed the show, don’t forget to like and share it so that we can get to the top of the comedy charts.
Here's a link to the Spotify playlist . . .
http://open.spotify.com/user/dasmartster/playlist/3KXcK2tV1pLMTiXUTVC0eQ

item.title: Franks & Pat Chat - Episode 3 "Cheer Up Donna Special"
item.description:
What do you do when you’ve got a down in the dumps Donna? That’s right, you discuss whether you would rather have legs as long as your fingers or have fingers as long as your legs . . .
In a bid to cheer up Grumpy Chops, we discuss a series of thought provoking “would you rather . . ." questions, reminisce about crash mats (remember them?), make up a new joke, and invent the "peddling rotator”. And all whilst nibbling on a rather delightful batch of flapjacks.
And remember folks, if you enjoyed the show, don’t forget to like and share it so that we can get to the top of the comedy charts.
Here's a link to the Spotify playlist . . .
spotify:user:dasmartster:playlist:1wDtWz6OOCNxulXFwJWuE9

item.title: Frank & Pat - Episode 2 Happy Birthday Special
item.description:
It’s my party and we’ll record a birthday Frank & Pat special if we want to!
Continuing our slot on www.brixtonradio.co.uk, we bring your our party favorites whilst sipping on carrot juice, eating birthday cake, making SMART objective birthday wishes and opening cheesy gifts . . .
And remember folks, if you enjoyed the show, don’t forget to like and share it so that we can get to the top of the comedy charts.
Here's a link to the Spotify playlist . . .
spotify:user:dasmartster:playlist:29QwfA0C1JIyPTaP9fJlfY

item.title: Frank & Pat - Episode 1 "New Years 2015 Special"
item.description:
We had a wee break and we have come back all revived & refreshed for New Year 2015. Coming at you from our new slot on www.brixtonradio.co.uk, we chat resolutions, lack of hobbies, Prosecco & dislocating knee joints amongst an eclectic selection of musical gems.
And remember folks, if you enjoyed the show, don’t forget to like and share it so that we can get to the top of the comedy charts.
Here's a link to the Spotify playlist . . .
http://open.spotify.com/user/dasmartster/playlist/6kYTkT39SCDMllFHeKcH8z

item.title: Frank & Pat Chat - Spooky Special
item.description: It's Halloween and we have got our Frank & Pat spook on. Listen in if you're brave enough . . . .
item.itunes:author: Frank & Pat
item.itunes:summary: It's Halloween and we have got our Frank & Pat spook on. Listen in if you're brave enough . . . .

item.title: Frank & Pat Chat - Poems, early drinking, and the launch of the Hobbywatch jingle
item.description:
We try our hand at being serious, with lyric inspired musical choices from Ian Dury, to Hozier, to Paul Simon. All whilst getting a little tipsy on a Bridget Jone's inspired cocktail.
We are also pleased to announce the debut of the show's first jingle for our new section, Hobby Watch.
item.itunes:author: Frank & Pat

We are also pleased to announce the debut of the show's first jingle for our new section, Hobby Watch.

item.title: Frank & Pat Chat - Carnival, Guinness Punch & Custard Face
item.description: In honour of Notting Hill Carnival 2014, we play Carnival inspired music, consume too much home made Guinness Punch, introduce a new & revolutionary new segment, and of course chat more quality crap chat than you can shake a stick at

item.title: Frank & Pat Chat - Nigels, new bands & rum based drinking
item.description: A fun packed show, full of new music, Glastonbury 2014 highlights, new snacks and drinks to review (mainly drinks if we are honest), and an apology to all Nigels.
item.itunes:author: Frank & Pat
item.itunes:summary: A fun packed show, full of new music, Glastonbury 2014 highlights, new snacks and drinks to review (mainly drinks if we are honest), and an apology to all Nigels.

item.title: Frank & Pat Chat Glasto 2014, Festivals & Cider
item.description: Chatting Glastonbury, festivals & cider, we run through what we think will be some of the highlights of Glasto 2014 and generally chat a load of rubbish.
item.itunes:author: Frank & Pat
